content: so use as many row as you like between the fades keeping enough to fade into the next color i like to calculate one extra gram into this just to be sure i won t run out of yarn adjusting for a different weight of yarn if you want to use something other than dk weight for this cowl that will be easy to do to make a cowl the same size as this one fsc or chain until you have an approximately 21 starting row making sure to have an even number of fscs or an odd number of chs if going with larger weights you may want to use less than four colors this pattern is original design made by trinitystitches this pattern is for personal use only and is not for distribution in any form please do not sell anywhere or post this pattern online
